General.Name: Kyeryong Const
General.Description: Kyeryong Construction Industrial Co., Ltd. operates as a construction company in Korea and internationally. Its project portfolio consists of civil works, such as roads/bridges, subways/railroads/tunnels, SOC private investment projects, and land development projects; and public buildings, business offices/commercial buildings, education/medical facilities, sports/cultural facilities, and public housing projects, as well as environmental facilities and plants. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Daejeon, South Korea.
